home.title: Build Resilient React Apps
home.subtitle: For Unreliable Networks
home.description: A focused set of React hooks designed to handle poor network conditions gracefully. Optimize images, manage polling, and queue offline requests with ease.

features.title: Core Hooks
features.subtitle: Three powerful hooks for network resilience

useAdaptiveImage.title: useAdaptiveImage
useAdaptiveImage.description: Automatically select image quality based on network speed. Serve low-res images on 2G, high-res on 4G.

useAdaptivePolling.title: useAdaptivePolling
useAdaptivePolling.description: Smart polling that adapts frequency to network conditions. Pauses when offline, faster on good connections.

useBackgroundSync.title: useBackgroundSync
useBackgroundSync.description: Queue requests while offline and sync them when connectivity is restored. No data loss, ever.

useNetworkStatus.title: useNetworkStatus
useNetworkStatus.description: Real-time network information including connection type, speed, and online/offline status.

focused.title: Focused
focused.description: Just the essentials. No bloat, no unnecessary abstractions.

typescript.title: TypeScript
typescript.description: Full type safety with comprehensive type definitions.

offline.title: Offline-First
offline.description: Built with IndexedDB persistence for true offline support.

cta.title: Ready to build resilient apps?
cta.description: Get started in minutes with our simple API.
